name: Chef Nazrul Islam
description: Chef Nazrul Islam is a Bangladeshi chef who specializes in traditional Bangladeshi cuisine. His website features a range of recipes, cooking tips, and information on his catering services and restaurant.

cooking_method: Marinate the meat with yogurt and spices.
Fry onions until golden brown and set aside.
Fry the meat until browned.
Parboil rice and layer with meat, potatoes, fried onions, and spices.
Add water and cook until rice is fully cooked.

recipes.name: Shorshe Ilish (Hilsa Fish in Mustard Sauce)
cooking_method: Mix the mustard paste, turmeric, and salt with water to make a sauce.
Fry the fish in mustard oil until golden brown.
Add the sauce and green chili to the pan.
Cook until the sauce thickens and the fish is fully cooked.

recipes.name: Chingri Malaikari (Prawn Curry in Coconut Milk)
cooking_method: Fry onions, garlic, ginger, and green chili until golden brown.
Add prawns, turmeric, cumin, coriander, salt, and sugar to the pan.
Fry until the prawns are cooked.
Add coconut milk and cook until the sauce thickens.
Add ghee and serve hot.
